    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCommand

        public GameCommand(Game game)
        Basic constructor
        Parameters:
        game - access to game data

    • Method Detail

      • rollForInitiative

        public void rollForInitiative()
        Starts new round, if game is not over. Chooses randomly which player goes first.

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        Transfers control to other player. If the other player is AI with auto set to true or has no units with actions remaining, will not transfer control. If neither player has units remaining, will start a new round.

      • nextPlayerTurn

        public void nextPlayerTurn()
        Cycles through players, checking if they have units with actions. Will also check if round or game is over.

      • checkIfRoundOver

        public boolean checkIfRoundOver()
        Checks if all units for all players have ended their turns and if so, begins a new round.
        Returns:
        true if all units have ended their turns.

      • checkIfGameOver

        public boolean checkIfGameOver()
        Checks if either player has no units left and if so, toggles gameOver to true.
        Returns:
        true if either player has no units left.

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves current activeUnit to current targetTile, ending turn if necessary and setting targetTile to null. Does not check if action is legit.

      • attack

        public void attack()
        Current activeUnit attacks unit in current targetTile, ending turn if necessary. Does not check if action is legit.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Current activeUnit ends its turn.

      • delay

        public void delay()
        Current activeUnit delays its turn until later in the round. Does not check if action is legit.

      • takeAITurn

        public void takeAITurn()
        Tells currently active player's AI to take a turn. Does not check if player has AI.

      • autoTurn

        public void autoTurn()
        Tells currently active player's AI to automatilly take future turns and take a turn. Does not check if player has AI.

      • aiAutoTurnCheck

        public void aiAutoTurnCheck()
        Checks if current player is AI and if so, if AI auto turn is true and if so, tells the AI to take a turn.

      • nextPlayerIfUnitDoneForTheRound

        private void nextPlayerIfUnitDoneForTheRound(Unit unit)
        Checks if provided unit has moved and attacked this turn, ending current player's turn if so.
        Parameters:
        unit - this is checked

      • unitAttacks

        public String unitAttacks()
        Current activeUnit attacks unit in current targetTile. Does not check if action is legit.
        Returns:
        description of result (hit, kill or miss)

      • setActiveUnit

        public void setActiveUnit(Unit activeUnit)
        Sets active unit and calculates movement costs if unit is not null.
        Parameters:
        activeUnit -

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()

      • getActiveUnit

        public Unit getActiveUnit()

      • unitSelectionDisabled

        public boolean unitSelectionDisabled()
        Used by graphical UI to see if activeUnit is in the middle of a turn, that is, has either moved or attacked but not both.
        Returns:
        true if disabled

      • setTargetTile

        public void setTargetTile(Tile targetTile)

      • getTargetTile

        public Tile getTargetTile()

      • getMoveCosts

        public int[][] getMoveCosts()

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
